snippet: Honda is adding hundreds of thousands of vehicles to a previously announced recall for passenger air bags that can explode with too much force and send shards of metal into the passenger compartment....

headline.print_headline: Honda Expands Air Bag Recall in Southern States
headline.main: Honda Expands Air Bag Recall in Southern States

lead_paragraph: Honda is adding hundreds of thousands of vehicles to a previously announced recall for passenger air bags that can explode with too much force and send shards of metal into the passenger compartment.
